channel.title: Why cna ppl cononect ot my server but my sis cant?
channel.description: why cant my sister join my server but other ppl can? its not hamachi and when she loggs in using my no-ip it says error conecting to server how do i fix? shes on a computer next to me....

item.title: Why cna ppl cononect ot my server but my sis cant?
item.dc:creator: @X-Zile-Pred X-Zile-Pred
item.description:
@X-Zile-Pred wrote:

If you have a router, You can connect but other people can’t… You can use 1 of the 3 ips…

  1. localhost
  2. 0.0.0.0
  3. 127.0.0.1

If you are trying to get a no-ip. Go to ‘www.no-ip.com’ and set up a No-Ip, Then all you need to do is Search, After you’ve created a host, Look for 1 of the many Tutorials that Moparscape has that is on Port Forwarding, After you’ve done that, People can connect with your server, Other then that, get hamachi

Read full topic
